name: axolotl amigurumi
notes:
**axolotl amigurumi - crochet pattern**  

this pattern is available for free on my blog - www.loopsandlovecrochet.com. here you are paying to purchase an ad-free, printable version of this crochet pattern.

this pattern includes instructions for making this crochet axolotl amigurumi. when finished, this axolotl measures about 5.5" tall. 
there are so many possibilities with color combinations that you could make a whole axolotl family, each one looking unique! 

this pdf pattern includes step-by-step instructions with lots of photos, which makes it easy to follow and also beginner friendly, but still fun for more experienced crocheter. i hope you enjoy making this axolotl as much as i did! 

materials:
•	worsted weight yarn - approx. 65 yards in total (55yds in main color, 10 yds accent color for tail fin and gills)
•	crochet hook (3.5mm size)
•	poly-fil/stuffing
•	safety eyes (8mm size)
•	embroidery or crochet thread (or strand of yarn) in black for mouth (and optional eyelashes)
•	yarn needle for sewing pieces together and weaving in ends

**you may make and sell any items made from this pattern, but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet.  please do not share, reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose. please do not re-publish photos as your own. thank you for respecting my rights as the designer and for supporting loops & love crochet. 

thank you and happy crocheting! 
loops & love crochet
